message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $14000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a piece valued at $12000 by you, but at a competitive price. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12000? I believe this would be a fair price considering the value I place on the product.
